title: #317: VICTIM F (Part 1) - Denise Huskins & Aaron Quinn Interview
description:
This episode is our first in a series about an extraordinary case called "Victim F." In March 2015, Denise Huskins and her boyfriend Aaron Quinn awoke at 3am to a nightmare. Armed men bound and drugged them, then abducted Denise, warning Aaron not to call the police or she would be killed. Aaron agonized about what to do. Finally he put his trust in law enforcement and dialed 911. Instead of searching for Denise, the police accused Aaron of her murder. Days later, when Denise was let go, instead of pursuing her abductors, they turned on her, accusing her of faking her own kidnapping. In their book, "Victim F" Aaron and Denise recount the horrific ordeal that followed. It is an unbelievable story that is all too true. You can read their book, co-written with investigative journalist Nicole Weisensee Egan "Victim F" available now on Amazon. https://amzn.to/3dhzvCJ


#VictimF

#DeniseHuskins

#AaronQuinn

#NicoleWeisenseeEgan

#believevictims


The clips used in this episode are from ABC's 20/20 : Taken. To view it in its entirety, click here https://abc.com/shows/2020/episode-guide/2021-06/04-taken

ROTHYS - What makes Rothy's shoes so good? Their unique seamless design is insanely comfortable the moment you put them on. Their styles are sustainably made with materials like plastic water bottles. Fully machine washable and available in tons of shapes, styles and colors. Head to www.rothys.com/realcrime to find your new favorites today!

UPSTART - Upstart is the fast and easy way to pay off your debt with a personal loan, all online. Find out how Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to www.upstart.com/realcrime 


SUPPORT OUR OTHER SHOWS! 

CRIME ANALYST - Across The Forgotten Victim series, Laura Richards analyses and deconstructs the murders and attacks on lone women committed by Peter Sutcliffe (known as PS throughout the series) in the north east of England in the 1960s and 1970s. Laura believes this is one of the most misunderstood cases of our time. Join Laura each week in the intelligence cell as she behaviourally breaks down each attack and highlights which cases she believes to be linked, why PS did what he did and how he was allowed to get away with it for so long. www.crime-analyst.com 


KILLER CASTING PODCAST - Lisa, Brian and Dean are deep diving into the brilliant Aussie crime show "Mr. Inbetween" streaming no on FX. We have some VERY special guests coming up from the cast including Damon Herriman (who played Charles Manson in BOTH "Mindhunter" and "Once Upon A Time in Hollywood", as well as hitman Ray Shoesmith himself, creator/writer/actor Scott Ryan!!. Tune into www.killercastingpod.com or go to wherever you listen to your podcasts including Apple Podcasts, https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/033-scott-ryan-mr-inbetween-promo-minosode/id1537283659?i=1000526626837, Spotify and Stitcher. Or click here for the latest show! https://killercasting.libsyn.com


AMERICA'S MOST WANTED - 

America’s Most Wanted is BACK, with Elizabeth Vargas hosting and Jim Clemente as an Executive Producer. You can stream it right now on Fox. . https://www.fox.com/americas-most-wanted/

BEST CASE WORST CASE

Be sure and check out Jim’s podcast Best Case/Worst Case that he does along with former Federal Prosecutor Francey Hakes. Join them as they go behind police lines with unparalleled access to law enforcement officers, looking back at their most memorable cases – for better or for worse. Subscribe now!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/best-case-worst-case/id1240002929

itunes:title: VICTIM F (Part 1) - Denise Huskins & Aaron Quinn Interview
itunes:summary: This episode is our first in a series about an extraordinary case called "Victim F". Jim, Lisa, and Laura speak with Denise Huskins and Aaron Quinn about their experiences with both criminals and law enforcement.
